info.narration: #0 heads to “$0's" containment unit to begin work.

collection.name: Floating Whale
collection.openText: The kids claim to have seen a green whale on the beach...

observe.desc: [ {... I don't think I'll ever go to that beach again. You likely know why. But allow me to explain. It was a sunny morning, I had gone to the beach with a couple of kids from the neighborhood, It was just us, and I thought we had everything we needed, "what could go wrong?". We had a blast, really. As the only grown-up there, I had to take care of the children, so I chose to follow them and found a bunch of green whales motionless on the seaside... already lifeless. You're aware that it's normal for whales in such cases to burst, right? I quickly tried to move the youngsters away from the spot; I still can't forget the bad smell in the atmosphere when one of the whale corpses exploded unexpectedly. I did my best...} ]

specialTipSize.specialTip: $0 Qliphoth counter decreased when the work result was bad.

$0 generates significant amounts of energy during Repression work. However, if it is repressed again within the same day, its body will explode, resulting in severe Black damage to the employee working with it.
After bursting, $0 will stabilize and will no longer be able to breach for the day, but its energy output will drop dramatically.
The supression or bursting of $0 can trigger other abnormalities.
